subject: Re: [junit] Fuckin Kama Sutra pics
msgSnippet: As a Yahoo member, you can chose any validated email address to use for the group. So those who s email addresses have been spoofed, could simply change what
messageBody:
As a Yahoo member, you can chose any validated email address to use for
the group.

So those who's email addresses have been spoofed, could simply change
what email they use. Then yahoo groups takes care of the emails from
the virus with the old address.

They need to see the 'edit membership' page of the group

Andrew

J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> Bradley, Todd wrote:
> > Didn't JB just announce last week that we have new moderators in place
> > for this email list?
>
> Yes. Someone is spoofing the e-mail address of an unmoderated user.
> Frankly, I don't know what to do about it. The problem hasn't become too
> serious yet, although it has hit a second person. Any suggestions?
> --
